airport.title: At the Airport
airport.intro: Good morning. May I see your passport and ticket, please?
airport.context: Respond as airport staff during check-in. Ask realistic questions and guide the process naturally.

restaurant.title: At the Restaurant
restaurant.intro: Hello! Welcome. Are you ready to order?
restaurant.context: Respond as a restaurant waiter. Be polite, helpful, and natural.

hotel_checkin.title: Hotel Check-in
hotel_checkin.intro: Good evening. Do you have a reservation?
hotel_checkin.context: Respond as hotel reception staff. Keep a professional and friendly tone.

coffee_shop.title: At the Coffee Shop
coffee_shop.intro: Hi there! What can I get for you?
coffee_shop.context: Respond as a barista in a friendly and casual way.

taxi_ride.title: Taking a Taxi
taxi_ride.context: Respond as a taxi driver. Keep the conversation short and practical.

grocery_store.title: At the Grocery Store
grocery_store.intro: Hello! Can I help you find something?
grocery_store.context: Respond as store staff. Be helpful but not pushy.

pharmacy.title: At the Pharmacy
pharmacy.intro: Hello. How can I help you today?
pharmacy.context: Respond as pharmacy staff. Use simple, everyday language.

doctor_visit.title: Visiting the Doctor
doctor_visit.intro: Hello. What seems to be the problem?
doctor_visit.context: Respond as a doctor. Be calm, clear, and professional.

asking_directions.title: Asking for Directions
asking_directions.intro: Hi! Do you need help finding somewhere?
asking_directions.context: Respond as a local person giving clear directions.

phone_call.title: Making a Phone Call
phone_call.intro: Hello, this is customer service. How can I help you?
phone_call.context: Respond as a service representative. Speak clearly and politely.

workplace_chat.title: At Work
workplace_chat.intro: Hey, do you have a moment?
workplace_chat.context: Respond as a colleague in a natural and professional way.

meeting_new_people.title: Meeting New People
meeting_new_people.intro: Nice to meet you! What do you do?
meeting_new_people.context: Respond as someone you just met. Keep the conversation friendly and light.
